CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 20, 1945, pg. 13 reads: "Terpsichoreans - These bright-eyed youngsters, Betty Love, Lendia O. Jackson, Patricia L. Chavis, Relda K. Tames and Mary Eaton, will be among the many participants who will appear on the Talent Night program sponsored by the Beauty Shop Owners' Association of Pennsylvania. The affair will be staged Oct. 25, at Schenley High School Auditorium. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Beverly Scott wearing dance costume of light colored satin pants and halter top, for performance at Talent Night, Schenley High School
